title: Add EmbeddedResource to CoreCompileCache
body:
See details at https://github.com/dotnet/project-system/issues/5794.

Should just be adding `@(EmbeddedResource)` here:

https://github.com/microsoft/msbuild/blob/8e4c5731440bf770f73447758ef51b4cae31a057/src/Tasks/Microsoft.Common.CurrentVersion.targets#L3406-L3412

nodes.body: Triaging to try for 16.7 because it should be really quick.
Do we need to add any other items besides those four types (`Compile`, `EmbeddedResource`, `ReferencePath`, `DefineConstants`)?
